heading: HR00046
0: A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE INCIDENT OF MIGHTY CORPORATION ATTEMPTING TO TECHNICALLY SMUGGLE IN SALOMAGUE PORT, CABUGAO, ILOCOS SUR TOBACCO CIGARETTES, VIS A VIS THEIR REPORTED UNDERVALUED DECLARATION OF IMPORTED RAW MATERIALS FOR THE PRODUCTION OF CIGARS AND CIGARETTES, AS THIS AFFECTS COLLECTION OF FEES, CHARGES AND EXCISE TAXES, UNDERMINING THE SHARE OF THE TOBACCO PRODUCING PROVINCES TO THE PROCEEDS OF RA 7171 AND RA 8240
status: Pending with the Committee on WAYS AND MEANS since 2016-09-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00046
FULL TITLE : A RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE APPROPRIATE COMMITTEE TO CONDUCT AN INVESTIGATION IN AID OF LEGISLATION, THE INCIDENT OF MIGHTY CORPORATION ATTEMPTING TO TECHNICALLY SMUGGLE IN SALOMAGUE PORT, CABUGAO, ILOCOS SUR TOBACCO CIGARETTES, VIS A VIS THEIR REPORTED UNDERVALUED DECLARATION OF IMPORTED RAW MATERIALS FOR THE PRODUCTION OF CIGARS AND CIGARETTES, AS THIS AFFECTS COLLECTION OF FEES, CHARGES AND EXCISE TAXES, UNDERMINING THE SHARE OF THE TOBACCO PRODUCING PROVINCES TO THE PROCEEDS OF RA 7171 AND RA 8240
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SAVELLANO, DEOGRACIAS VICTOR B.
DATE FILED : 2016-07-04
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Pimentel (013 2016-08-22)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON WAYS AND MEANS ON 2016-09-05
